item.description:
This workshop will focus on the use of guided imagery and visualization for relaxation, pain management as well as goal setting. Learn how to achieve mind-body wellness and boost physical energy with these creative visualization exercises.

This is a special 1.5 hour workshop. If you want to experience a feeling of deep relaxation, this is the meetup to attend!

The meetup will take place at Together in Motion. Please follow this link for driving directions:
http://www.togetherin....
There's free parking available.

The studio is also accessible by public transportation. The closest subway station is Davis Square (red line). From there you can walk or take a bus (bus 87).

Please go to the back of the building (Sunnyside Ave.) and look for a sign that says Stress Reduction and Relaxation meetup (right next to Broadway Auto Sales). The room is upstairs.
item.name: Creative Visualization Techniques
